channel.title: Error Connecting to Server
channel.description:
I am not trying to get login to my own server, this happens sometimes on different servers that I want to play. Servers such as The Wildy, Roatpkz, and now Olympus I know for a fact are all online yet it says Error Connecting to Server. And No im not banned on them.
I have changed my ip, I have let the private servers pass through my firewall, Any ideas on how to fix?
*Roatpkz let me on randomly one day after 2 years

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

b boy death1:

Can you tell me what I should tell the owner on how to fix because he doesn’t know.

Is it a webclient you’re trying to play on? If so do what sk8rdude said and add it to your java exceptions list if the self signed client doesn’t have a certificate.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @b_boy_death1 b boy death1
item.description:
@b_boy_death1 wrote:

Can you tell me what I should tell the owner on how to fix because he doesn’t know.

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is something the server owners have to take care of.
Make sure your Java is up to date and that if on the webclient you’ve put the website on the whitelist for Java.

Read full topic
